topic.title: Did the Trolling and primitive racism here stop?
topic.body:
hey guys, I've been absent of zeronet for a while and now that I'm back I have the feeling that the niveau of discussion has improved since. Is this just my subjective feeling, or do you think this as well?

A few months back the ZeroTalk-site was full of Antisemitism and other hatefull (nonconstructive) postings. Was this just because of the election, or has there been a general improvement?

Since I checked last, the option of muting users was added. Did this really have such a big effect?

1_1CMYxdit4qq9QGk9DYRu2ruRPd2YDGckH8.body:
> [nofish](#comment_329_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): It check the fps every 3 secs and if it's drops bellow  25 then stops the animation.https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroID/blob/master/js/Particles.coffee#L190Whats your os/browser?

what? Did you want to answer in this thread?

> [thegillies](#comment_4_1NTgaYjK2bh1axvruth8HqtGt6Pw5ab13x): I think it's actually improved. [...]
So it's not only me. That's good news I think!

Yeah regarding nofish - very strange. Maybe we should contact him. That might me a very strange bug.
